graph_title: Number of companies that have a Common Good Balance Certificate
indicator_name: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita
source_organisation_1: International Federation for the Economy for the Common Good e.V.
target_name: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries
page_content: The indicator shows how many companies in Treptow-Köpenick have a valid certificate of a common good balance sheet in each year.
